privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

sections.heading: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create a site, upload photos, or contact us.

sections.heading: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: We use the information to provide and improve our services, personalize your experience, and communicate with you.

sections.heading: Data Security
sections.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.

sections.heading: Sharing Information
sections.content: We do not share your personal data with third parties except as required by law or with your explicit consent.

sections.heading: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your data. Contact us to make a request regarding your personal information.

sections.heading: Changes to This Policy
sections.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using this website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to any of these terms, please do not use the website.

modifications.title: 2. Modifications of Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms of Use at any time. Changes will take effect immediately upon posting on the website. It is the user's responsibility to periodically review the terms.

usage.title: 3. Use of the Website
usage.content: You agree to use the website only for lawful purposes and in a manner that does not infringe the rights of third parties or restrict the use and enjoyment of the website by other users.

intellectual_property.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.content: All content on this website, including texts, images, logos, and graphics, is our property or licensed to us and is protected by copyright laws and other intellectual property laws.

liability.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: We are not responsible for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use the website.

law.title: 6. Governing Law
law.content: These Terms of Use will be governed and interpreted in accordance with the laws of the country in which we operate, without regard to conflict of law principles.

contact.title: 7. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions or concerns about these Terms of Use, please contact us at: contact@example.com.
